name: api-lift
author: Sitegui <sitegui@sitegui.com.br>
description: Create a ready-to-go express router for a REST API with filters, input validation, output checking, versioning, automatic routes and logging

scripts.docs: rm -rf docs2 && jsdoc -d docs2 -c docs.json -R README.md -t jaguarjs-jsdoc
scripts.commit-docs: npm run docs && git checkout gh-pages && rm -rf docs && mv docs2 docs && git add docs -A && git commit
